The Problem

The Banking System Is Broken

It's not because founders are risky. It's because banks have no way to verify who they really are. Traditional KYC was never built for the internet age.

Identity Failure

Banks use passport + selfie verification. Deepfakes are up 300%. Documents prove nothing about who you really are.

Automatic Rejection

Banks blacklist 100+ countries. No data means auto-reject. 40% of legitimate founders from emerging markets get denied.

Account Freezes

Even approved founders get frozen. One unusual transaction and your account is shut down overnight.

Compliance Chaos

Tax filings are manual and confusing. Miss a deadline and face a $25,000 penalty. Most founders don't even know what's required.

How It Works

Four steps to US banking

From verification to compliant US banking in days, not months.

Step 01

Verify Your Digital Lineage

Connect GitHub, LinkedIn, and Stripe. We analyze 5 years of history that deepfakes can't fake.

Step 02

Get Your Trust Score

Our proprietary scoring system evaluates Digital Lineage, business signals, identity, and trust network.

Step 03

Formation + Banking

We handle LLC formation, EIN acquisition, and bank application with your verified Trust Score package.

Step 04

Stay Compliant

Anti-Freeze Shield monitors transactions. Automated compliance handles BOI, Form 5472, and annual reports.

Beyond Documents

Your passport expired.
Your legitimacy didn't.

You left Belarus, Russia, or another country where going back to renew your passport isn't an option. You've been building real businesses for years. But every bank rejects you because their automated KYC can't handle an expired document.

We built BedRock for you.

The system wasn't built for this

Thousands of legitimate founders across Europe and the CIS are locked out of the financial system. Not because they're risky, but because they left their home countries and can't renew a passport.

Belarusian developers in Warsaw. Russian founders in Tbilisi. Ukrainian entrepreneurs in Berlin. They have real revenue, real customers, real track records. But a piece of paper with an expiry date decides whether they can open a bank account.

Traditional KYC asks: â€œIs this document valid?â€

BedRock asks: â€œIs this person legitimate?â€

Those are very different questions. And the answer is in the digital footprint you've been building for years.

Your digital footprint speaks louder than any document

FAQ

Frequently asked questions

Everything you need to know about BedRock

We support founders from over 100 countries. Our Digital Lineage verification works for anyone with a digital footprint. Countries on OFAC sanctions lists have limited options, but our tiered risk system means strong Digital Lineage can override country penalties.

Digital Lineage verification takes about 10 minutes. Trust Score is calculated instantly. LLC formation takes 3-7 days, EIN 4-14 days, and bank approval 7-14 days.

Stripe Atlas forms your company but doesn't help you get approved by banks. They reject the same founders banks reject. BedRock verifies your Digital Lineage â€” 5 years of GitHub commits, LinkedIn history, and revenue data â€” to prove who you are in a way deepfakes can't fake.

We work with multiple partner banks. If one bank rejects your application, we help you apply to alternatives. Standard and Premium plans include multiple bank applications. Our AI drafts appeal letters with your documentation.

Digital Lineage is our core innovation. Instead of just checking documents (which deepfakes can fake), we verify 5 years of your digital history: GitHub commits, LinkedIn connections and endorsements, Stripe revenue, domain age, and social media timeline. This creates an identity that's impossible to fabricate retroactively.

Available on Premium plans, Anti-Freeze Shield monitors your transactions and alerts you before sending payments that might trigger a bank review. It helps you upload documentation proactively and drafts responses if your bank asks questions.

No! Our entire process is designed for remote founders. You can complete verification and get approved without visiting the US. We handle LLC formation and bank applications remotely.

We offer a full refund if you cancel within 7 days of purchase and before we submit any bank applications on your behalf. After that, refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis.
